t = int(input())
for _ in range(t):
    (n, a, b, c) = map(int, input().split())
    mn1 = min(a, b)
    a -= mn1
    b -= mn1
    mn2 = min(b, c) if b > 0 else 0
    if mn1 + mn2 >= n:
        print('YES')
    else:
        print('NO')

for _ in range(int(input())):
    (a, b, c, d) = map(int, input().split())
    fm = min(b, c)
    print('YES') if min(b, c) + min(c - fm, d) >= a else print('NO')
